name: Dragon Hunter (itch) (SlugeHugo)
description:
Dragon Hunter is a project I'm working on which is similar to Super Mario Galaxy... but medieval fantasy.

This is a very early test version.

You might have to alt + F4 if you click the noticeboard. Just a warning.

---

Controlls Keyboard:

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump (and dubble jump)

Ctrl - Crouch and Ground Pound

Left Mouse Button - Attack

---

Controlls Controller:

Left stick - Movement

A (lower button) - Jump (and dubble jump)

B (Right button) - Crouch and Ground Pound

X (Left button) - Attack
